closing.title: Closing Confirmation
closing.message: If you confirm this action, the popup will be closed.

delete.title: Delete Confirmation
delete.message: If you confirm this action, this marker will be deleted.

helper_text.accent_color: It will be used as the primary color for the app.
helper_text.appointment_start: The starting time for the appointment shift (in 24-hour format).
helper_text.appointment_end: The ending time for the appointment shift (in 24-hour format).
helper_text.appointment_length: The length of the appointment slot (in minutes).
helper_text.brand: The logo image of the company.
helper_text.email_gmail: It must be a Google Gmail account.
helper_text.state_coverage: States where there is service coverage. Empty means all.
helper_text.utility_company: The utility companies available to be selected.

auth.account_confirmation: Please verify your email address so you can sign in if even forget your password. We have sent an email to:
auth.email_not_found: There is no account associated with this email
auth.email_not_valid: The email address is not valid
auth.email_provider: The email provider must be GMAIL
auth.email_resent: The confirmation email has been resent
auth.email_sent: An email has been sent to the provided email. Check it out for the next steps.
auth.email_taken: There is an account associated with this email
auth.not_authorized: You are not authorized to access the app
password_rule: Contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase character.
Contain at least one number, one letter and one special character.
auth.password_invalid: The password doesn't follow the rules specified
auth.pending_confirmation: This account has not been confirmed yet.
auth.reset_password: You have requested a password reset. Your password must follow the rules below:
auth.wrong_credentials: The provided credentials do not exist

quote.description_ground: With ground mounts, we need to confirm the location of the installation for correct calculations. Please fill out the details below and we will contact you.
